1.1.0.en: Added Device Discovery on Setup and IP-change detection. Improved usability and design.

1.1.2.en: Resolved issue with readme and app-description

1.1.3.en: Fixed bug that manually added devices could not be used.

1.2.0.en: Updates on/off status, if TV gets switched on or off manually.

3.3.0.en: Added support for Homey V5 + Added Flow-Action + Added WakeOnLAN + Bugfixes

3.4.0.en: Added support for Homey V5 + Added three new Flow-Actions + Added WakeOnLAN + Bufixes

4.0.0.en: New UUID-Discovery + Specific channel selection + bugfixes
